func_sig.description: Calculate the distance between two points in 3D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_3d

point1.description: The first point as an array [x1, y1, z1].

point2.description: The second point as an array [x2, y2, z2].

func_sig.description: Calculate the surface area and volume of a cone given its radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_and_volume_of_cone
